STUDENT_COURSE_COL.name: STUDENT_COURSE_COL
STUDENT_COURSE_COL.description: The Column index of the column that contains the students course. Please note all indexes start at 0

data.description: Columns 8 is expected to be the first value

data.name: CH30132
data.description: This unit is a natural science unit

data.name: CH40196
data.description: This unit is a natural science unit

STUDENT_NAT_SCI_UNITS.name: STUDENT_NAT_SCI_UNITS
STUDENT_NAT_SCI_UNITS.description: This is a list of all the units that are natural science students. If a student has one of these values in thier course column they will be interpreted as a natural science student.

STUDENT_NAME_COL.description: The column index that conatins the students name in the input student file. Please note column indexes start at 0

STUDENT_USERNAME_COLUMN.name: STUDENT_USERNAME_COLUMN
STUDENT_USERNAME_COLUMN.description: This is a column index of where students are stored in the input student file. Note indexes start at 0

STUDENT_INPUT_FILE.name: STUDENT_INPUT_FILE
STUDENT_INPUT_FILE.description: The location of the student input file

data.name: STUDENT_DATA
data.description: Object containg all configuration to do with students

SUPERVISOR_TOPIC_COL.name: SUPERVISOR_TOPIC_COL
SUPERVISOR_TOPIC_COL.description: The column index of the supervisor topic area in the supervisor input file. Please note that column indexes start at 0

SUPERVISOR_INPUT_FILE.description: The location of the supervisor input file

SUPERVISOR_NAME_COL.name: SUPERVISOR_NAME_COL
SUPERVISOR_NAME_COL.description: The column index of where the supervisor name is held in the input supervisor input. Please note all column indexes start at 0

SUPERVISOR_CAPACITY_COL.name: SUPERVISOR_CAPACITY_COL
SUPERVISOR_CAPACITY_COL.description: The column index of where the supervisor capacity is held. Please note that all column indexes start at 0

MATCHING_CHOICE_PREFERENCE_WEIGHTS.description: This is a list of preferences weights. Describing the cost of a student supervisor matching based on preferences

MATCHING_ENABLE_KEYWORD_ALLOCATION.description: If True key word allocation will be enabled

MATCHING_TOPIC_AREAS.name: TOPIC_AREAS
MATCHING_TOPIC_AREAS.description: This is the list of topic areas that a supervisor can belong too

MATCHING_NO_MATCH_WEIGHT.description: This is the cost of a no match. This value is used in evaulating the effective weight of a matching

MATCHING_NO_TOPIC_AREA_MATCH_WEIGHT.description: This is the cost of a no keywords match. This value is used in creating a the cost function that

MATCHING_KEYWORD_LOWER_BOUND_TO_ALLOCATE.name: MATCHING_KEYWORD_LOWER_BOUND_TO_ALLOCATE
MATCHING_KEYWORD_LOWER_BOUND_TO_ALLOCATE.description: If keyword allocations are enabled. An allocation between a student and supervisor will be allowed if the number of keywords in common exceeds this value

MATCHING_KEYWORDS_PREFERENCE_WEIGHTS.description: This is a list of cost weights to be attributed to potential matchings regarding keywords

MATCHING_TOPIC_AREA_PREFERENCE_WEIGHTS.description: This is a list of cost weights to be attributed to potential matchings regarding topic areas

MATCHING_NO_KEYWORDS_IN_COMMON_WEIGHT.description: This is the cost of a no keywords match. This value is used in creating a the cost function that
